MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Match(class NUnit.Framework.Api.ITest test) cil managed

Docs.param: The test to which the filter is applied
Docs.summary: Determine whether the test itself matches the filter criteria, without examining either parents or descendants.
Docs.returns: True if the filter matches the any parent of the test

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MatchDescendant(class NUnit.Framework.Api.ITest test) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determine whether any descendant of the test matches the filter criteria.
Docs.returns: True if at least one descendant matches the filter criteria

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MatchParent(class NUnit.Framework.Api.ITest test) cil managed

Docs.param: The test to which the filter is applied
Docs.summary: Determine whether any ancestor of the test matches the filter criteria
Docs.returns: True if the filter matches the an ancestor of the test

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Pass(class NUnit.Framework.Api.ITest test) cil managed

Docs.param: The test to which the filter is applied
Docs.summary: Determine if a particular test passes the filter criteria.
Docs.returns: True if the test passes the filter, otherwise false
